agile 读至81页

mans = %w[wiser wiserwx wang]
mans.each { |man| print "hello #{man}\n"}
mans.each do |man|
  print "do hello #{man} \n"
end

begin
 raise "error"
rescue Exception 
  puts " have error"
end

def show 
  puts "show"
end

class Human
  show
  def initialize name
    @name = name
  end

  def name
    @name
  end
  
  def name= name
    @name = name
  end

  private
  def secret
    puts "shit"
  end

  def secret2
    puts "shit shit"
  end

 def self.print_name name
    puts name
  end
end

Human.print_name "hongmizi"
wiser=Human.new "wiser"
puts wiser.name
wiser.name= "another wiser"
puts wiser.name
#wiser.secret
#wiser.secret2 #secret2 also is a private method
puts "----"
a = "hello"
puts a 
a = 5
puts a
